neighbors.name: Juan G. Salas
neighbors.claims: Juan G. Salas is the owner of parcel 400-35-431, a residential property located at 9087 S. 253rd Drive in Buckeye, Maricopa County, Arizona ([Live AZ Co](https://liveazco.com/sold-listing/detail/1110411217/9087-S-253RD-Drive-Buckeye-AZ)). The property consists of a single-family home built in 2006 within the Parkplace at Buckeye community ([Zillow](https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/9087-S-253rd-Dr-Buckeye-AZ-85326/81986757_zpid/)). Public records indicate the property is serviced by Arizona Public Service (APS) for electric utilities ([Zillow](https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/9087-S-253rd-Dr-Buckeye-AZ-85326/81986757_zpid/)). No public statements or documented positions on local development by this specific landowner were found in available county news or records.

approach_recommendations.engage: Since Salas has a low public profile and no known stance, a one-on-one, neighborly outreach is recommended, focusing on sharing project information and listening to any personal concerns.

neighbors.verification_notes: Removed claim regarding the 1954 Glendale city directory; archival search confirms the entry was for 'Juan G. Sandoval', not Salas. Excluded public comments made by a 'Juan Salas' regarding Salt River Project (SRP) solar rates in 2024; the subject property is in APS territory, suggesting the commenter is a different individual. Confirmed subject is not the 9/11 victim of the same name (deceased 2001), as the subject property was built in 2006.
